mapper.insert: insert into attachments ( a_seq, bm_seq, `contentType`, download, filename, filesize, save_name, save_path) values ( #{a_seq}, #{bm_seq}, #{contentType}, #{download}, #{filename}, #{filesize}, #{save_name}, #{save_path})
mapper.select: select a_seq, bm_seq, `contentType`, download, filename, filesize, save_name, save_path, seq from attachments where seq = #{seq}
select a_seq, bm_seq, `contentType`, download, filename, filesize, save_name, save_path, seq from attachments where bm_seq = #{bm_seq} and a_seq = #{a_seq} order by seq desc
